title: Financial Markets
description: Taught by Nobel Laureate Robert Shiller, this course provides an overview of how financial markets operate.

title: Machine Learning for Trading
description: Use machine learning to build trading strategies using real market data.

title: Financial Engineering and Risk Management Part I
description: Learn to model financial assets and manage risk using engineering techniques.

title: Investment and Portfolio Management with ETFs
description: UBuild a Winning Investment Portfolio. Improve your investment strategies with real-world skills, insights, and analytical tools.

title: Stocks and Bonds
description: This course is part of Foundational Finance for Strategic Decision Making Specialization

title: Trading Strategies in Emerging Markets
description: Explore high-level strategies tailored to volatility and risk in emerging economies.

title: Options Trading Basics (Skillshare)
description: Learn how options trading works with real examples and practical insights.
